author: kfogel
msg: Regression test for issue #1970 ("history-following algorithm incomplete"):
(test_list): Run them both, the latter XFail.
(basic_history): Moved to new file above and renamed.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Retain the commit message if there is a failure converting to UTF-8.
This fixes a problem where a commit message is deleted because it has a
non-convertable character (i.e. an accent character - like é!) and the user
(svn_cl__edit_externally): Set the tmpfile_left variable earlier so that if
we bail out in the UTF-8 checks, we will still retain the log message and
print out a suitable hint to the user.

author: marcosc
msg: Fixed 60 fuzzy translations and 29 untranslated messages.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Translate é to é to fix Java insanity on UTF-8 file systems.
